bShowTriangleROIBorder: Render the geometry selection as the border of the triangles in the ROI (region of influence)
bShowHidden: Show occluded parts of the selection
bShowEdgeSelectionVertices: This tool treats edge selections as vertex selections. Enable this to show the edited vertices
LineThickness: Line thickness used to render the geometry selection
PointSize: Point size used to render the geometry selection
DepthBias: Depth bias used to slightly shift depth of points/lines
FaceColor: Color used to render the geometry selection
LineColor: Color used to render the geometry selection
PointColor: Color used to render the geometry selection
TriangleROIBorderColor: Color used to render the geometry selection ROI
